articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Former Movie Actor
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Former Movie Actor
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Saturday sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Ryong Rin, winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, People's Artiste and former actor of the movie actors group of the Korean Film Studio, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Site of Stock-breeding Base in Sepho Area
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Site of Stock-breeding Base in Sepho Area
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the construction site of the stock-breeding base in Sepho area.
					 Going round the construction site, the premier called for raising the quality of buildings as befitting structures of the model stock-breeding base in the 21st century and underscored the need for relevant units to supply sufficient quantities of cement, structural steel and other building materials to the construction site.
					
					 He also went round the project for remodeling the Central Zoo.
					
					 He encouraged service personnel and builders to achieve signal successes in the project and held a consultative meeting of officials concerned on the issues arising in the project.

articles.title: Constituencies, Sub-constituencies for Elections to Deputies Organized in DPRK
articles.content:
Constituencies, Sub-constituencies for Elections to Deputies Organized in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Constituencies and sub-constituencies for the elections of the deputies to the provincial (municipal), city (district) and county people's assemblies were organized on Friday according to the DPRK Law on the Elections of Deputies to the People's Assemblies at All Levels.

articles.title: Nationwide Support to Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station
articles.content:
Nationwide Support to Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station 
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- An all-party, all-state and whole society support is given to the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station.
					 Thousands of young people including participants in the 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits and officials of youth league rushed to the construction site to help members of the shock brigade there in accelerating the project. 
					
					 Officials of party and power bodies and working people's organizations in North Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces encouraged them by taking care of their living and giving helping hands to them.  
					
					 Organizations of the youth league in the relevant factories and enterprises are supplying cement, structural steel and other building materials to the construction site. 
					
					 More than 100 units of equipment, devices and tools, tens of thousands of daily necessaries, articles for cultural use and at least 200 tons of goods for supply service have been sent to the members of the shock brigade and builders by different ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Officials of the Ministry of Coal Industry visited the workers busy with the drive to increase the coal production in order to ensure the supply of cement necessary for the construction of the power station and provided them with lots of equipment and aid materials.
					
					 The Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and the Ministry of Forestry sent more than 100 000 saplings to the construction site.
					
					 Similar backing is being given by officials of the Education Commission, Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, Ministry of Machine-building Industry, Ministry of Chemical Industry and the Ministry of Agriculture.

articles.title: Localization Drive Brisk at Light Industrial Factories of DPRK
articles.content:
Localization Drive Brisk at Light Industrial Factories of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Light industrial factories in the DPRK have made signal achievements in localization of raw materials and equipment.
					 Kanggye and Haeju knitwear factories manufactured cyclic flow dyers through a technological innovation movement and the Hamhung Woolen Mill succeeded in localizing filter fabric for vinalon spinning.
					
					 The Hamhung Shoes Factory developed a new adhesive for the production of vinyl chloride shoes with sea water and the Pyongyang Mechanical Pencil Factory upgraded color lead of plastic pencil by use of polyethylene glycol. 
					
					 The technicians and workers in the light industrial field are now striving to boost the production of consumption goods with reliance on the domestic resources and technology.

articles.title: New Kinds of Lubricants Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kinds of Lubricants Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Central Mining Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK manufactured various kinds of lubricants with powder of high-purity molybdenum disulfide.
					 According to Jong Chol, director of the Institute, those lubricants are highly resistant to pressure in friction of machinery components.
					
					 In particular, bearing lubricant is very effective for machinery components operating in extra-high vacuum condition. With less consumption, it helps lengthen the serviceable life of bearing twice as compared with ordinary lubricants or grease.
					
					 The lubricants, totally based on local raw materials, have already been applied to various industrial establishments, winning great popularity among users.

articles.title: Pyongyang Turns into Greenery
articles.content:
Pyongyang Turns into Greenery
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is daily changing its appearance as a city covered with green foliage.
					 This year more than 500 000 fruit and other trees were planted in streets, parks and compounds of industrial establishments.
					
					 New species of cosmos came into full bloom in different parts of the city covering an area of 110 000 square meters, including Pyongyang Baby Home, Orphanage and Pyongyang Catfish Farm.
					
					 Also, turfs of new species were planted in areas of 213 000 square meters.
					
					 The Horticultural Management Bureau of the Pyongyang City People's Committee has enhanced its role to further afforest every district of the city, taking flexible measures to solve the issues arising in planting trees and laying out green areas.
					
					 Meanwhile, a brisk work is going on to plant more fruit trees in farms around the city.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Exploits Performed by Kim Jong Il in Party Building
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Exploits Performed by Kim Jong Il in Party Building 
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- It is the fundamental requirement for building a revolutionary party to develop it into the party of the leaders and the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the only one which successfully accomplished this important cause. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was the peerlessly great man who developed the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and led the revolutionary cause of Juche, revolutionary cause of Songun to one victory after another, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Since his start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK he clarified important guidelines for building a revolutionary party, sitting up all night. 
					
					 After making an overall review and analysis of the century-long history of the preceding working class ideology with his outstanding ideological and theoretical wisdom he clarified the originality and scientific accuracy of Kimilsungism and formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as an integral system of idea, theory and method of Juche. 
					
					 From the very day he started his work at the WPK Central Committee he strictly adhered to the principle of party organization building centered on the leader in the firm belief that the center of the  leadership in the party is the only one and the leadership center and the leadership system are inseparable from each other. 
					
					 His cause of party building is now being successfully carried forward and accomplished by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Show Their Will to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration in Practice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Show Their Will to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration in Practice
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Respecting and implementing the June 15 joint declaration is the most realistic way of bringing the catastrophic situation of the inter-Korean relations under control and achieving peace and reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 This is evidenced by the tragic situation where the joint national event to celebrate the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration failed to take place, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas planned to hold the joint national event and significantly celebrate the 15th anniversary of the joint declaration. But such desire was dashed.
					
					 The south Korean authorities put up absurd preconditions and deliberately laid hurdles in the way of the event, making it abortive and once again bringing to light their true colors as confrontation maniacs.
					
					 The above-said grave situation once again proves that no progress can be expected from the inter-Korean relations as long as the south Korean regime's negative stand on the declaration, ie, its confrontation policy towards the DPRK remains unchanged.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not mislead public opinion at home and abroad by putting up the hypocritical signboard of "dialogue" but show their will to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in practice, concludes the article.

articles.title: There Would Be No Safe Haven for Those Clinging to Hostile Policy towards DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
There Would Be No Safe Haven for Those Clinging to Hostile Policy towards DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
						
  Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The new commander-in-chief of the U.S. forces in the Pacific recently cried in distress that north Korea is the biggest threat to Asia-Pacific and he would frequently wake up because of north Korea.
					 The U.S. ambassador in Seoul jabbered that Washington takes a serious note of north Korea's military muscle.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. had better recollect its frequent nuclear blackmail with nuclear strike means by staging war rehearsals aimed to "liquidate the headquarters" of the DPRK and "occupy Pyongyang" before talking about "threat from north Korea."
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces are making shrieks, complaining that they can hardly have a sound sleep. This is a natural product of their hostile policy toward the DPRK, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The service personnel of the DPRK are bolstering up at a remarkably high tempo nuclear deterrence for self-defence with its powerful strategic strike means as a mainstay now that the U.S. hostile policy toward it gets ever more undisguised.
					
					 It is long since the DPRK entered into the full-fledged stage of manufacturing smaller and diverse nuclear strike means. It does not hide the fact that it has reached the phase of ensuring the precision and intellectual level and the highest rate of hits of its long-range rockets.
					
					 Aggressors can never find any safe haven.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Spreading Germ Weapons
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Spreading Germ Weapons
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The truth behind the hideous crimes the U.S. has perpetrated by seriously threatening and infringing upon mankind's existence with various toxic germs and substance is being brought to light in succession.
					 Shortly ago, a south Korean movie man opened to public the original text of the inquiry report of an international fact-finding group that disclosed the atrocities the U.S. imperialists perpetrated by conducting a germ warfare in the past Korean war.
					
					 The report worked out in 1952 has been given wide publicity by media but it is the first time that its original text was made known.
					
					 It was disclosed recently that the U.S. introduced in top secrecy anthrax germs into its base in south Korea from its mainland to conduct a test for germs suited to the climate on the Korean peninsula, lashing world people into great fury.
					
					 Such facts have brought into bolder relief the gravity of the crimes being perpetrated by the U.S. for its germ and chemical warfare against humanity.
					
					 Unspeakable are the casualties and pain and misfortune the Korean and other people of the world suffered due to the germ warfare and chemical warfare of the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. had already mapped out a scenario for developing germ weapons in October, 1950, stepped up its moves for implementing it and made no scruple of using them in the Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists mercilessly killed more than 1.23 million innocent people in the northern half of Korea through indiscriminate bombing and bio-chemical warfare during the war.
					
					 In the post-war period, the U.S. used south Koreans as guinea pigs for tests on such bio-chemical weapons as epidemic hemorrhagic fever germ and toxic material RH-787 on many occasions.
					
					 During the Vietnamese war, the U.S. conducted operations for spreading varieties of toxic chemicals throughout Vietnam, killing or injuring 2.1 to 4.8 million people.
					
					 The wars ignited by the U.S. against Afghanistan and Iraq were terrible wars in which various type bio-chemical weapons were massively used by GIs to massacre civilians and deplete environment.
					
					 Various war scenarios mapped out by Washington included bio-chemical warfare. The U.S. has staged drills with huge forces involved in various parts of the world including south Korea every year, pursuant to the scenarios.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. history of aggression is just the history woven with hideous crimes it perpetrated with bio-chemical lethal weapons the use of which is strictly banned by international law, in a desperate bid to realize its wild ambition for dominating the world.
					
					  This being a hard reality, the U.S. is so shameless as to noisily talk about the non-existent "bio-chemical threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. put under carpet the truth behind its crimes of germ and chemical warfare recorded in the world history as the most barbarous crimes against humanity.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the arch criminal developing toxic lethal weapons and chief culprit of their proliferation as it has turned south Korea into a test ground for bio-chemical warfare, feigning ignorance of the atrocities perpetrated by it but noisily trumpeting about someone's "threat."
					
					 The U.S. is bound to be buried in the graveyard of history for the above-said crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Accused of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Accused of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Joint Measure Committee for Discovering Remains of Civilians Killed in Sannae, Taejon during the War held a press conference outside the Taejon City Office on June 17 at which it denounced the conservative group for escalating confrontation with the DPRK, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 In a press release the organization lashed out at the "government" for working hard to convert the "freedom hall" into a place for inciting confrontation between fellow countrymen under the pretext of "recreation of cultural and historic sites".
					
					 The press release demanded an immediate stop to an act of turning the site of Taejon Prison into a center for confrontation.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Escalating Confrontation with North
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Escalating Confrontation with North
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se, when recently meeting a U.S. deputy secretary of State, cried out for tightening cooperation with the U.S. in order to "cope with provocation and threat" from the north, pulling up it over its nukes. There he trumpeted about the need to "ratchet up pressure upon the north" to bring about "substantial progress in its denuclearization."
					 The south Korean puppet war maniacs under the signboard of the "month for protecting the country" staged large-scale joint firing drills and conducted joint rehearsals even with policemen, reserve forces and public officers involved.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 This is an unpardonable provocative act of chilling the desire of all Koreans for detente on the Korean peninsula and improving the north-south relations, total denial and a blatant challenge to the idea of By Our Nation Itself, the main spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It is no more than hypocrisy and jargon for the south Korean regime to talk about "dialogue" while ratcheting up pressure and sanctions against the compatriots in the north in league with foreign aggressors.
					
					 Dialogue and confrontation, process to mend the relations and war drills can never go together.
					
					Trust-based dialogue and improved relations between the north and the south can never take place as long as the south Korean ruling forces persist in political and military confrontation with the backing of outsiders as now,
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to behave with reason, properly understanding what the fellow countrymen desire and what the times require.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Success of August 15 Joint National Event
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Success of August 15 Joint National Event
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Organizations in different sectors and 14 regional headquarters including the Workers, Farmers, Youth and Students, Media and Academic Headquarters under the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a joint press conference proclaiming "the period of June 15-August 15 joint campaign" in Seoul on June 15, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News. 
					 The organizations declared they would make all efforts to successfully ensure the joint national event marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and preserve the independence of the nation and peace.
					
					 They said that under the slogan "Meeting leads to reunification!" they would work hard for the success of  the nationwide joint event in Pyongyang on August 15  this year, the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					
					 Noting that the organizations would promote again the holding of workers' football game for reunification on the occasion of August 15, they warned if the authorities block it, they will brand them as an unjust regime and fight against it.
					
					 Then, they held a symbolic ceremony of demanding the lifting of "May 24 step" and denouncing the U.S. attempt to wage a germ war and Japan's moves to revive militarism.

articles.title: DPRK Government Statement Supported by Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
DPRK Government Statement Supported by Chongryon Officials
						
 Tokyo, June 19 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on June 18 in support of the statement released by the DPRK government to open up an epochal phase in the development of the north-south relations under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, said the writers and artistes of the union are missing very much Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, once again recollecting the north-south summits, the adoption of the joint declaration and remarkable changes and achievements made in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 Ri Thae Il, chairman of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, noted that the young Korean people in Japan will positively join in the nationwide movement for opening up an epochal phase in the development of the inter-Korean relations under the banner of the joint declaration and thus devote all efforts to making this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation a decisive year in accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 Ri Yong Su, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said that the statement of the DPRK government comprehensively clarifies the basic stand to be adhered to in improving the inter-Korean relations and settling the reunification issue, the way of defusing tension and steps for doing so, and reflects ardent patriotism and the  Korean nation-first spirit of paving a wide avenue to independent reunification by bringing about a great turn and changes in the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Kim Ro Hyon, chairman of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan, said that the Korean sportspersons in Japan would intensify sports activities with broad strata of compatriots involved and make tangible contributions to the movement for thoroughly implementing the north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Convinced of Emergence of Homeland as Scientific and Technological Power
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Convinced of Emergence of Homeland as Scientific and Technological Power
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Song Jae Su, head of a delegation of the Osaka Branch of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan, expressed deep admiration for the shining achievements made in efforts to improve the people's living standards and build an economic power while staying in the socialist homeland.
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is ushering in a heyday of prosperity unprecedented in the history spanning five thousand years, Song said, adding: Under his wise guidance structures of eternal value to be impeccable even in the distant future are springing up in various parts of the country.
					
					 The reality of the homeland clearly proves that even a small country can emerge a power when it is guided by the great leader.
					
					 I am picturing myself the happy people in the homeland who will enjoy all blessings under socialism in a thriving nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is working heart and soul to put the scientific researches onto a higher stage as required by the developing reality.
					
					 Signal successes are being made in the scientific and technological development of the homeland under his wise leadership.
					
					 Immensely honored and happy are the scientists and technicians who are deeply loved and trusted by Kim Jong Un for having made signal achievements for the country and its people.
					
					 We are convinced of the rosy future of the homeland as a scientific and technological power.

articles.title: Koreans in China Resolve to Greet 70th Anniversary of Korea's Liberation as Grand Festival
articles.content:
Koreans in China Resolve to Greet 70th Anniversary of Korea's Liberation as Grand Festival
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released a statement on June 16.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the Pyongyang summit was provided and the June 15 joint declaration was adopted and published, a historic event which brought an epochal turn in improving the north-south relations and carrying out the cause of national reunification, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The publication of the joint declaration made it possible for the north and the south to defuse the distrust and confrontation which had lasted for more than half a century and greet a new era of advancing toward reconciliation, unity and reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The key to paving a wide avenue to independent reunification is to defuse the danger of war and create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula, halt the confrontation of social systems aimed at inciting distrust and conflict between the north and the south and conduct brisk dialogue, negotiations, contact and exchange.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all the Koreans in China will make every possible effort to greet with splendor the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation as a grand festival of the nation to go down in history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Look after the People in a Responsible Manner as a Mother Would Do with Her Children" was brought out in booklet by a German publishing house.
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on June 9.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Malaysia, Germany and DR Congo between June 5 and 13 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The administrative director of the Malaysian Chinese Association said that Kim Jong Il was the great statesman who developed the WPK into an invincible party and the WPK could win victories only thanks to his tireless efforts.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that the WPK could develop into the party serving the people both in name and reality while invariably regarding the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as its guidelines since Kim Jong Il started his work at the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee of DR Congo for the Study of the Juche Idea stressed that through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung into the great ideology steering the era of independence.
					
					 A congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in DR Congo.

articles.title: Ugandan Personage Supports June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Ugandan Personage Supports June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement released a statement on June 12 in support of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Expressing full solidarity with the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the declaration, a milestone for Korea's reunification, the statement said:
					
					 The publication of the declaration added a special page to the history of the movement for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The main spirit of the declaration reflecting the three principles of national reunification advanced by President Kim Il Sung is to reunify the country with the concerted efforts of all Koreans free from foreign interference.
					
					 The declaration is the most fair and reasonable one for Korea's reunification and a bomb-like one to the U.S. and pro-U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					 We call on all the peace-loving people in the world to actively support the joint declaration.

articles.title: Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea Supported in Guinea
articles.content:
Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea Supported in Guinea
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of opening the solidarity period for supporting the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea took place in Conakry, Guinea on June 11.
					Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, said the service personnel and people of the DPRK, under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the iron-willed invincible commander, inflicted an ignominious defeat upon the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and honorably defended the sovereignty and independence of their country.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said the U.S. has disturbed the development and prosperity of socialist Korea, getting hell-bent on stifling it, for the 60 odd years since the former's bitter defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, denounced the U.S. for pulling up the DPRK again over its satellite launch, adding satellite launch, an independent right of a sovereign country recognized by international law, can never be held in check by anyone.
					
					 Plans for solidarity events to be held from June to October were published at the ceremony.

articles.title: Myanmar Paper Observes Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle
articles.content:
Myanmar Paper Observes Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle
  Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Myanmar paper The New Age carried an article titled "Meaning of Korean War" on June 10 to observe the June 25-July 27 month of the anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					  The paper said:
					
					 After occupying south Korea under the mask of "liberators" in the wake of World War II, the U.S. ignited the Korean war on June 25, 1950, prompted by its wild ambition for putting the whole Korean peninsula under its control and dominating the world.
					
					  The war was the fiercest one. But a miracle was witnessed.
					
					  The DPRK defeated the U.S. against all expectations and common knowledge.
					
					  The brilliant victory of the DPRK was a fruition of the gifted stratagem and wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					  It is 60 years since the end of the war. But the U.S. remains unchanged in its hostile policy toward the DPRK and the danger of a new war is increasing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					  The DPRK today is no longer what it used to be in the 1950s.
					
					 The past Korean war brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for the U.S. but a new Korean war will put a total end to the U.S.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan held a meeting and photo exhibition on June 10 to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Displayed at the venue of the event were a photo of leader Kim Jong Il signing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, photos dealing with the undying revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un inspecting units of the Korean People's Army and providing field guidance to different domains of the national economy.
					
					 Also displayed there were the full text of the June 15 joint declaration and photos showing the development of the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were Chairman Ju Yong Il and officials of the association, heads of compatriots art troupes and compatriots.
					
					 Ju Yong Il said that the compatriots will bear in mind that the way of implementing the June 15 joint declaration is the one for stepping up the reunification of the country and make positive contributions to the work for the reunification and prosperity of the country.
					
					 Then the compatriots went round the venue of the photo exhibition.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Introduced by Organizations of South Africa, Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Introduced by Organizations of South Africa, Brazil
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- South African and Brazilian organizations posted special write-ups on their websites to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website on June 9 articles accompanied with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The articles praised him for regarding it as the most important task to strengthen the WPK into the party of the leader and carrying out it with success.
					
					 They said that he developed the WPK into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization and the party which achieved the unity of actions in which the monolithic ideological system and leadership system of the leader have been thoroughly established, and the party which formed a harmonious whole with the popular masses, taking care of their destiny in a responsible manner and faithfully serving them.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK edited an article accompanied with his picture on June 8.
					
					 The article said that the exploits he performed in party building would shine forever along with socialist Korea which is making a long drive.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Ryong Rin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Ryong Rin
						
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 20 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kim Ryong Rin, condecorado con el Premio Kim Il Sung y Actor del Pueblo, quien era ex actor de los Estudios Cinematograficos de Corea, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre base ganadera en zona de Sepho y Parque Zoologico Nacional
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre base ganadera en zona de Sepho y Parque Zoologico Nacional
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno el campo de construccion de la base ganadera en la zona de Sepho y el de reparacion del Parque Zoologico Nacional
					Los constructores de la base ganadera abonan y cuidan bien los herbazales ya formados y aceleran la construccion de objetos importantes inclusive las fabricas de procesamiento de carne y pienso y los establos de ganados.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos del campo de construccion de la base ganadera el premier exhorto a elevar la calidad de las obras y asegurar satisfactoriamente el cemento, el acero y otros materiales de construccion.
					
					En el Parque Zoologico Nacional el premier estimulo a los  innovadores militares y constructores que logran exitos y organizo una reunion consultiva de los funcionarios de la rama interesada para discutir los problemas pendientes en la obra. 
					
					Alli se acelera con vigor la construccion del museo natural, el edificio principal, el acuario y otros objetos en acato al noble amor al pueblo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Establecidos en RPDC distritos y subdistritos para elecciones de diputados
articles.content:
Establecidos en RPDC distritos y subdistritos para elecciones de diputados
　Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Segun la ley de elecciones de diputados a las asambleas populares a todos niveles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fueron establecidos el dia 19 los distritos y subdistritos electorales para las elecciones de diputados a las Asambleas Populares de las provincias (las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro), las ciudades (los municipios) y los distritos.

articles.title: Efectuada funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenile
articles.content:
Efectuada funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil
						
　Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Se ofrecio el dia 19 en la Casa Central de la Juventud la funcion del grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil con motivo del 51o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					　En la escena se pusieron la poesia en narracion y la cancion "El partido es el regazo del General", la cancion y baile "La fogata", el duo masculino "Jovenes, apoyemos a nuestro Partido", el entreacto "Celebremos dignamente", el trio de la musica instrumental nacional y el solo femenino "Cancion de abundante pesca en el mar" y otras piezas.
					
					　Los ejecutantes elogiaron las hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien manifesto a todo el mundo la dignidad y el  aspecto majestuoso de la patria y la nacion al fortalecer el Partido del Trabajo de Corea como potente fuerza directiva de la revolucion del Juche, la de Songun, con su genial ideologia y teorias y sabia direccion.
					
					　Tambien se ofrecieron las piezas que reflejan la decision de los vanguardistas juveniles de Songun de apoyar con seguridad la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					　La funcion mostro el entusiasmo e impetu de los jovenes de manifestar a todo el mundo el espiritu invencible de la potencia de la juventud, bajo la direccion del PTC. 
					
					　Presenciaron la funcion los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, jovenes y estudiantes de esta capital.
